short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fight off the hordes of zombies and try to get the highest score!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This game is just a fun little game to play when you're bored in your free time.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move around
Shift to run
Space to jump
Left click to shoot
Right click/C to aim in

Changelog:

v0.0.0.3 - 10/15/21
Made the time to kill on zombies faster
Increased the spawn delay on each spawner from 10 to 11 seconds
There is a well known bug with the grenades (G). Please do not press this key or it may freeze your game. We are currently working to fix this bug.

v0.0.0.2 - 10/12/21
- Added optimized lighting for low-end devices
- Made "c" a alternate aim in button so its easier for laptop users to aim in
- Optimized the textures more for low-end devices

v0.0.0.1 - 10/11/21
- The game was introduced
